sourcesContent:
export const translations = {
  zh: {
    // Header
    appTitle: '测试助手',
    requestBuilder: 'API',
    history: '历史记录',
    collections: '集合管理',
    settings: '设置',
    
    // Settings
    settingsTitle: '设置',
    settingsSubtitle: '自定义你的测试助手体验',
    languageSettings: '语言设置',
    languageDescription: '选择你偏好的界面语言',
    themeSettings: '主题设置',
    themeDescription: '选择你喜欢的界面主题',
    otherSettings: '其他设置',

    autoSave: '自动保存',
    autoSaveDescription: '自动保存请求历史',

    lightTheme: '浅色主题',
    lightThemeDesc: '明亮清晰的界面',
    darkTheme: '深色主题',
    darkThemeDesc: '护眼的深色界面',
    
    // Request Builder
    method: '方法',

    params: '参数',
    body: '请求体',

    confirm: '确认',
    close: '关闭',
    
    // Additional
    requestInfo: '请求信息',
    basicInfo: '基本信息',
    requestHeaders: '请求头',
    urlParams: 'URL参数',
    requestBody: '请求体',
    responseInfo: '响应信息',
    statusCode: '状态码',
    responseTime: '响应时间',
    responseSize: '响应大小',
    errorType: '错误类型',
    errorMessage: '错误消息',
    errorDetails: '详细信息',
    responseBody: '响应体',
    responseHeaders: '响应头',
    requestFailed: '请求失败',
    requestCompleted: '请求完成',
    readyToSend: '准备发送',
    sending: '发送中...',
    notSet: '未设置',
    none: '无',
    sendRequestFirst: '发送请求后，响应将显示在这里',
    requestError: '请求错误'
  },
  en: {
    // Header
    appTitle: 'Test Assistant',
    requestBuilder: 'API',
    history: 'History',
    collections: 'Collections',
    settings: 'Settings',
    
    // Settings
    settingsTitle: 'Settings',
    settingsSubtitle: 'Customize your Test Assistant experience',
    languageSettings: 'Language Settings',
    languageDescription: 'Choose your preferred interface language',
    themeSettings: 'Theme Settings',
    themeDescription: 'Choose your preferred interface theme',
    otherSettings: 'Other Settings',
    otherDescription: 'More customization options',
    autoSave: 'Auto Save',
    autoSaveDescription: 'Automatically save request history',
    resetSettings: 'Reset Settings',
    saveSettings: 'Save Settings',
    lightTheme: 'Light Theme',
    lightThemeDesc: 'Bright and clear interface',
    darkTheme: 'Dark Theme',
    darkThemeDesc: 'Eye-friendly dark interface',
    
    // Request Builder
    method: 'Method',
    url: 'URL',
    send: 'Send',
    headers: 'Headers',
    params: 'Parameters',
    body: 'Body',
    response: 'Response',
    status: 'Status',
    time: 'Time',
    size: 'Size',
    
    // History
    noHistory: 'No History',
    noHistoryDesc: 'Send your first request to start recording',
    retry: 'Retry',
    delete: 'Delete',
    clearAll: 'Clear All',
    
    // Collections
    noCollections: 'No Collections',
    noCollectionsDesc: 'Create your first collection',
    createCollection: 'Create Collection',
    collectionName: 'Collection Name',
    description: 'Description',
    create: 'Create',
    cancel: 'Cancel',
    
    // Common
    loading: 'Loading...',
    error: 'Error',
    success: 'Success',
    confirm: 'Confirm',
    close: 'Close',
    
    // Additional

    basicInfo: 'Basic Info',
    requestHeaders: 'Request Headers',
    urlParams: 'URL Parameters',
    requestBody: 'Request Body',
    responseInfo: 'Response Info',

    readyToSend: 'Ready to Send',
    sending: 'Sending...',
    notSet: 'Not Set',
    none: 'None',
    sendRequestFirst: 'Send a request to see the response here',
    requestError: 'Request Error'
  }
};

export const getTranslation = (language, key) => {
  return translations[language]?.[key] || key;
};
